AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.'s vehicle: Black Dodge pickup truck stopped by Officer Reymundo Reyes for failing to use a turn signal on Farm-to-Market Road 2050, searched after IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR. gave consent, and had conflicting ownership claims
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol agent who testified about the characteristics of Farm-to-Market Road 2050 and his experience with vehicles in the area
Defendant who challenges the traffic stop performed by United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: Paved road with two lanes, one in each direction, and no shoulder, where United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino encountered the defendants' vehicles
